title: Anaphora3290
author: Anaphora3290
content: Link to all of our social media: https://linktr.ee/AnaphoraAIThe reward distribution of Anaphora AI's Bounty is guaranteed. The distribution will occur on September 20, 2023.This bounty campaign begins now! This will be a 10 week bounty.All participants have to submit their weekly reports (for social campaigns) on this bounty thread. Stakes will be calculated on a weekly basis. For each week, you are required to make new reports. Edited reports and POA will not be counted.Proof Of Registration Format (All participants must post 1 time here in this thread):PROOF OF REGISTRATIONBitcointalk Forum Username:Bitcoin talk Forum Profile Link:Telegram Username:Participated Campaigns:ETH Wallet Address:Weekly Report Format:Week:Bitcointalk Username:Telegram Username:CampaignTwitter Profile Url:Spreadsheet page name (twitter, telegram, etc):Retweets/Tweets Url:1. …2. …3. …4. …5. …1. All Participants need to visit the official Anaphora AI website.2. All participants must join the Anaphora AI official Telegram Group and make at least 1 good comment.3. All participants must follow all of the Anaphora AI social media accounts at https://linktr.ee/AnaphoraAI4. Please note that any offensive or inappropriate behavior will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign.5. Using multiple accounts, cheating and spamming are not allowed. You will be disqualified from the bounty program immediately and all of your accounts will be banned permanently.6. The bounty manager and the project team reserve the right to make changes to the conditions at any time.7. PARTICIPANTS CAN NOT CHANGE THEIR WALLET ADDRESS AFTER REGISTRATION. PLEASE DOUBLE-CHECK YOUR WALLET ADDRESS BEFORE REGISTERING FOR ANY CAMPAIGN.8. PARTICIPANT'S FORUM ACCOUNT SHOULD BE AT LEAST 3 MONTHS OLD PRIOR TO PARTICIPATING IN ARTICLE AND VIDEO CAMPAIGNS. ARTICLE AND  VIDEO SUBMISSION FORM WILL BE CLOSED 3 DAYS BEFORE THE END OF THE BOUNTY.9. ALL PARTICIPANTS MUST SEND PROOF OF REGISTRATION POST TO JOIN THE BOUNTY PROGRAM.10. 30,000,000 ANAPH tokens are to be divided according to the stakes accumulated amongst participants. Proof Of Registration Format (All participants must send 1 time):Forum Username:_____Forum Profile Link:_____Telegram Username:_____Participated Campaigns:_____ETH Wallet Address:_____Weekly Report Format:ALL REPORTS WILL BE SENT USING GOOGLE REPORT FORMS!REPORTS MADE ON THE THREAD WILL NOT BE CALCULATEDFOR TWITTER, INSTAGRAM, REDDIT, TELEGRAM, DISCORD - USE WEEKLY FORMS POSTED BELOW.FOR CONTENT AND VIDEO (MEDIUM AND YOUTUBE) - USE SIGNUP FORMSTwitter              20%Telegram          16%Discord             12%Reddit                8%Medium              7%Instagram           5%Article               14%Video/YouTube   10%Translation          8%Note: Due to the bounty duration and bounty pool, we have limited the number of participants for this Bounty. For Twitter First 950 Participants only, for Discord First 850 Participants only, for YouTube First 750 Participants only, for Reddit and Telegram First 800 Participants only,and for Instagram First 500 Participants only.--> Clicking on the week you want to report will open the report form ←Week 1 https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1bHVXV5IxGxbRAsy_F0nzFGaKLtAmJiBGf4hum0CjhLU/edit?usp=sharingWeek 2Week 3Week 4Week 5Week 6Week 7Week 8Week 9Week 10TWITTERRewards:1. Have more than 501 followers: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 1501 followers: 3 stakes/week3. Have more than 5001 followers: 5 stakes/week4. Have more than 10,001 followers: 10 stakes/weekRules: 1. Every participant must follow the Anaphora AI Twitter Page.2. Twitter account must be original (90% in Twitter audit).If you have less than 90% real followers you will be disqualified from the campaign. Cleaning your Twitter account is useless.3. Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 501 followers.4. Participants have to retweet 5 tweets per week (maximum 1 retweet/day).5. Time gap between 2 retweets/tweets needs to be 10 hours minimum.6. Participants must use #AnaphoraAI #ANAPH #ETH #Ethereum hashtags in every retweet or tweet.How to join:1. Join the Anaphora AI official Telegram Group.2. Fill out the registration form: https://forms.gle/xB2AxBHw7WDwW4Xn6DISCORDRewards: 1. Have more than 501 friends: 1 stake/week3. Have more than 2501 friends: 3 stakes/week5. Have more than 4501 friends: 5 stakes/weekRules:1. Every participant must follow the Anaphora AI official Discord.2. Participants have to do 5 posts per week3. Time gap between 2 shares/posts needs to be 10 hours minimum.How to join:1. Join the Anaphora AI official Telegram Group.2. Fill out the registration form: https://forms.gle/xB2AxBHw7WDwW4Xn6REDDITRewards:1. Have more than 20 Karma: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 500 Karma: 3 stakes/week3. Have more than 2500 Karma: 5 stakes/week4. Have more than 5000 Karma: 10 stakes/weekRules: 1. Every participant must follow the Anaphora AI official Reddit Page.2. Reddit account must be at least 1 month old with at least 10 posts and 20 karma.3. Make at least 5 meaningful and good comments about Anaphora AI on the Anaphora AI Subreddit. Commentsshould have a minimum of 75 characters to be considered. One comment per day and 5 comments per week.4. Upvote at least 1 Reddit post from Anaphora AI's subreddit per day and 5 posts per week.5. Those who have at least 200 post karma MUST make one post on the subreddit https://reddit.com/r/cryptomoonshots  Use ERC-20 FlairHow to join:1. Join Anaphora AI official Telegram Group.2. Fill the registration form: https://forms.gle/xB2AxBHw7WDwW4Xn6TELEGRAMRewards:20 stakes/weekRules:1. Update your Telegram name to "Your Name |Anaphora AI Ambassador''. Only one project is allowed in your Telegram name.2. Replace your profile picture with the Anaphora AI logo3. Write at least 5 good messages in other crypto-related telegram groups.Posts/messages must be constructive, useful and in a way which will not be considered as spamming.4. Deleted messages will not be counted.5. Report your telegram message links weekly. Please obey the report dates and format.6. You must stay in the telegram group until the end of the campaign to receive your stakes.7. You must wear Anaphora AI's avatar and text until the end of the campaign to receive your stakes.8. Participants can only wear one project name at a time. Wearing more thanone project in your telegram name will disqualify you from the campaign.9. Your telegram username must be visible to all while in the community. You mustinteract with the Telegram account with which you have registered the campaign.Violation of this rule will lead to the removal of all earned stakes.10. Write at least 5 constructive messages in top exchange’s telegram groups (Example: Binance, Kucoin,Gate.io, MEXC etc).11. Spam or Deleted messages will not be counted. Hashtags "#" are not allowed in the conversation.12. Report your telegram message links weekly. Please obey the report dates and format.How to join:1. Join Anaphora AI official Telegram Group.2. Fill the registration form: https://forms.gle/xB2AxBHw7WDwW4Xn6INSTAGRAMRewards:1. Have more than 500 followers: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 1000 followers: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 2500 followers: 3 stakes/weekRules: 1. Every participant must follow the Anaphora AI official Instagram Page.2.Your Instagram Account must be at least 1 month old.3. You must be an active Instagram user and must Like and Share a minimum of 5 of Anaphora AI posts weekly. Sharesmust include the following hashtag: #AnaphoraAI #ANAPH #ETH #Ethereum to be rewarded.4. You must comment on a minimum of 2 posts from Anaphora AI Instagram page weekly.5. Account must be open as a Public Profile and all Posts shared need to be public as well.How to join:1. Join Anaphora AI official Telegram Group.2. Fill the registration form: https://forms.gle/xB2AxBHw7WDwW4Xn6MEDIUMWe are looking for writers, bloggers, and journalists who are willing to produce written content about the project.The produced written pieces must be Quality and unique. You can post on medium and other blogging websites.You MUST follow the Anaphora AI Medium pageRewards: High quality: 5 stakesGood quality: 3 stakesAverage quality: 1 stakesRules: 1. Articles should be quality and unique with a minimum of 600 words and receive 10 likes/comments/upvote etc. or 50 views.( Participants who copy the project's website, whitepaper or ANN thread,will not receive rewards). Views and comments would be taken note of.2. Each participant can write 1 article only.3. Participant's forum account should be at least 3 months old prior to participating in the article campaign.4. Articles should be published on Medium or substack4. Content must focus on a relevant topic: project features, latest project's token updates, blockchain, etc.5. Only original content will be accepted.6. Articles should never be removed.7. Removal/deletion will result in disqualification.8. Published Articles must include at least 2 images of the project, link to the the Proof of Authentication, project website,Medium page, Twitter page, Telegram group, Facebook page, YouTube channel or any other social media.9. Please provide enough details of the writer (bounty hunter) at the end of the article to ensure authenticity. This will be verified!10. By joining this program, all participants accept that the project team can use all of these articles as marketing materials.How to join:1. Join Anaphora AI official Telegram Group.2. Fill the registration form: https://forms.gle/xB2AxBHw7WDwW4Xn6Note: Article submission will be closed 3 days before the end of the bounty.YOUTUBERewards:High quality: 5 stakes (High quality content)Good quality: 3 stakes (Good quality content )Average quality: 1 stakes (Average quality content)Rules: 1. Every participant MUST Subscribe to the Anaphora AI YouTube Channel.2. Videos need to be a minimum of 3 minutes in length and have at least 500 Subscribers.3. Each participant can send 1 video only.4. Participant's forum account should be at least 3 months old prior to participating in the video campaign.5. Video contents must focus on a relevant topic: project features, latest project's token updates, blockchain, etc.6. Only original video content will be accepted. Copy from the project website, YouTube channels or from others' work will be rejected.7. Videos should never be removed.8. Removal/deletion will result in disqualification.9. All videos need to have a link to the Proof of Authentication, project website,Medium page, Twitter page, Telegram group, Facebook page, YouTube channel or any other social media.10. Please provide enough details of the producer (bounty hunter) at the end of the video to ensure authenticity. This will be verified!11. By joining this program, all participants accept that the project team can use all of these videos as marketing materials.How to join:1. Join Anaphora AI official Telegram Group.2. Fill the registration form: https://forms.gle/xB2AxBHw7WDwW4Xn6Note: Video submission will be closed 3 days before the end of the bounty.Translation of our Website is required in 16 languages: Korean, Chinese, Russian, Japanese, German, French, Italian, Dutch,Portuguese, Spanish, Turkish, Indonesian, Vietnamese, Hindi, Arabic, Urdu.Rewards: Whitepaper Translation: 100 stakesRules: 1. Translation of our Whitepaper and some custom docs are required in 16 languages: Korean, Chinese, Russian, Japanese, German, French, Italian, Dutch, Portuguese, Spanish, Turkish, Indonesian, Vietnamese, Hindi, Arabic, Urdu.2. Translators must be a native speaker of the aforementioned languages.3. Translators must have work experience as a translator in other Bounty programs (links to your previous works).4. Please fill the registration form to reserve your native language. Do not start the translation before getting approval from the BM. Approval is needed!5. Translations using translator programs will be disqualified. Participants caught in this act will be disqualified from all Bounty Detective's Bounties.6. By joining this program, all participants accept that the project's team can use all of these translations as marketing materials.7. Upon completion of translation, send the link to your work using THIS FORM How to join:1. Join Anaphora AI official Telegram Group.2. Fill the registration form: https://forms.gle/xB2AxBHw7WDwW4Xn6
